text: Nanny McPhee Returns (released in the United Kingdom as Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang) is a 2010 fantasy comedy family movie directed by Susanna White, produced by Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner and Lindsay Doran with music by James Newton Howard and co-produced by StudioCanal, Relativity Media, Working Title Films and Three Strange Angels. It is a sequel to the 2005 movie Nanny McPhee. It was adapted by Emma Thompson from Christianna Brand's Nurse Matilda books. Thompson reprises her role as Nanny McPhee, and the movie stars Maggie Gyllenhaal, Ralph Fiennes, Rhys Ifans, Ewan McGregor, Asa Butterfield and Maggie Smith. The movie was theatrically released on August 20, 2010 by Universal Pictures. == Release dates == Country Premiere 25 March 2010 26 March 2010 26 March 2010 26 March 2010 31 March 2010 31 March 2010 1 April 2010 1 April 2010 (German speaking region) 1 April 2010 1 April 2010 1 April 2010 1 April 2010 2 April 2010 7 April 2010 7 April 2010 (French speaking region) 9 April 2010 15 April 2010 22 April 2010 22 April 2010 22 April 2010 22 April 2010 22 April 2010 23 April 2010 30 April 2010 30 April 2010 6 May 2010 13 May 2010 13 May 2010 14 May 2010 27 May 2010 28 May 2010 2 June 2010 4 June 2010 4 June 2010 4 June 2010 10 June 2010 10 June 2010 10 June 2010 10 June 2010 11 June 2010 11 June 2010 11 June 2010 11 June 2010 15 July 2010 15 July 2010 30 July 2010 11 August 2010 20 August 2010 20 August 2010 16 September 2010 17 September 2010 24 September 2010 30 September 2010 8 October 2010 23 December 2010 2 July 2011 == Other websites == * * Category:2010 fantasy movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Movies about nannies Category:Movies about children Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies based on books Category:American sequel movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard
